name: InventorySummary_GetAllInventorySummaryByinventoryNumber
description: Get a range of InventorySummary - ScreenId=IN401000

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$block: This class represents a InventorySummary in InventorySummaryController. Used by getting data.

$ul: **available**: The table > Available > The quantity of the stock items available at the specific warehouse and location.

**availableForShipment**: The table > Available for shipment > The quantity of the stock items available at the specific warehouse and location calculated based on the quantity on hand with the quantities shipped and on shipping deducted.
**baseUnit**: The table > Base unit > The unit of measure (UoM) selected as the base unit for the stock items in the Stock items (IN202500) window.
**dropShipForSO**: The table > Drop-ship for sales order > The quantity of the stock items listed on open drop-ship orders. This value is not included in the quantity available.

**dropShipForSOPrepared**: The table > Drop-ship for sales order, prepared > The quantity of the stock items listed on drop-ship sales orders with a status of On hold or Pending approval; this value is not included in the quantity available.

**dropShipForSOReceipts**: The table > Drop-ship for sales order, receipts > The quantity of the stock items listed on receipts for drop-ship sales orders; this value is not included in the quantity available.
**errorInfo**
**estimatedTotalCost**: The table > Estimated total cost > The estimated total cost of the stock items available at the specified warehouse and location.
**estimatedUnitCost**: The table > Estimated unit cost > The estimated unit cost of the selected stock items.
**expired**: The table > Expired > The quantity of the stock items that has reached its expiration date.

**inAssemblyDemand**: The table > In assembly demand > The quantity of the stock items included in unreleased kit assembly documents as components or kits, depending on whether the item is a kit or a kit component.
**inAssemblySupply**: The table > In assembly supply > The quantity of the stock items listed on unreleased kit assembly documents.
**inIssues**: The table > Inventory issues > The quantity of the stock items included in the inventory issue documents that have not yet been released.
**inReceipts**: The table > Invnetory receipts > The quantity of the stock items included in the inventory receipt documents that have not yet been released.
**inTransit**: The table > In transit > The quantity of the stock items included as in transit quantities in the inventory transfer documents that have not yet been released.
**inventory**: Mandatory field: The top part > Item ID* > 	The stock item for which you want to view data. Click the magnifier.
**description**: Name of item/description
**number**: Number of item
**location**: The top part > Location > The location for which you want to view data; select a location, or make no selection to view data for all locations.
**id**: Click the magnifier > The identifier
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**metadata**
**maxPageSize**
**totalCount**
**notAvailable**: The table > Not available > The quantity of the stock items on locations for which the Include in qty. available option is not selected.
**onHand**: The table > On hand > The quantity of the stock items available on hand at the specified warehouse and location.

**poReceipts**: The table > Purchase order receipts > The quantity of the stock items included in the purchase receipts that have not yet been released. To view the purchase receipts, open the Purchase receipts (PO302000) window.
**purchaseForSO**: The table > Purchase for sales order. > The quantity of the stock items listed on open purchase orders created for sales orders.
**purchaseForSOPrepared**: The table > Purchase for sales order prepared > The quantity of the stock items listed on purchase orders yet on hold or pending approval and created for back orders.
**purchaseForSOReceipts**: The table > Purchase for sales order receipts > The quantity of the stock items listed on purchase receipts for orders that were created for sales orders.
**purchaseOrders**: The table > Purchase orders > The quantity of the stock items included in open purchase orders. To view the purchase orders, open the Purchase orders (PO301000) window.
**purchasePrepared**: The table > Purchase prepared > The quantity of the stock items listed on purchase orders pending approval and on hold.
**soAllocated**: The table > Sales order allocated > The quantity of stock items set aside according to sales orders.
**soBackOrdered**: The table > Back orders > The quantity of the stock items on sales orders with the Back order status.
**soBooked**: The table > Sales order booked > The quantity of the stock items booked according to sales orders.
**soShipped**: The table > Sales orders shipped > The quantity of the stock items shipped according to the confirmed shipments.
**soToDropShip**: The table > Sales order to drop-ship > The quantity of the stock items included in open purchase orders created for drop-ship orders.
**soToPurchase**: The table > Sales order to purchase > The quantity of the stock items included in unreleased sales orders requiring creating purchase orders.
**warehouse**: The top part > Warehouse > The warehouse for which you want to view data.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**stateLocation**
